ch.usi.inf.lidr.merging
Class SSL

java.lang.Object
  ch.usi.inf.lidr.merging.SSL
All Implemented Interfaces:
ResultsMerging, ScoreNormalization
public final class SSL
extends Object
implements ResultsMerging

The semi-supervised learning (SSL) results merging/score normalization algorithm. SSL first learns the transformation function between source-specific and centralized (normalized) document scores based on a set of training data-points. Then this function is applied to source-specific document scores, thus normalizing them.

This implementation assumes that each search engine uses its own scoring function, possibly different from scoring functions of other search engines (this corresponds to the "multiple search engine types" case in the paper, section 3.3).

Author:
Ilya Markov
See Also:
"A semisupervised learning method to merge search engine results", Luo Si and Jamie Callan. ACM Transactions on Information Systems, pages 457-491, 2003.

Field Detail

centrScores

private final Map<Object,Double> centrScores
The mapping between sample documents and their centralized (normalized) scores for a given query. Used for training SSL.

IMPORTANT: the mapping must be set for each query using setSampleDocuments(List) before normalizing document scores.

See Also:
setSampleDocuments(List)
Constructor Detail

SSL

public SSL()
Method Detail

setSampleDocuments

public void setSampleDocuments(List<ScoredEntity<Object>> sampleScoredDocs)
Sets the list of sampled documents. This list must contain documents, sampled from all sources of information/search engines. Scores of all documents must be calculated by one single scoring function for a given query.

In other words, the following steps must be performed in order to obtain the sampleScoredDocs list.

  1. Sample a number of documents from each source of information/search engine.
  2. Create a single index out of all these documents.
  3. Run a given query on this index.
  4. Wrap obtained results into a list of ScoredEntity objects.
  5. Pass this list to the current method.

IMPORTANT: this method must be called for each query before performing normalization.

Parameters:
sampleScoredDocs - The list of documents, sampled from all sources of information/search engines, with scores calculated by one single scoring function.
Throws:
NullPointerException - if sampleScoredDocs is null.
See Also:
centrScores

getRegression

private <T> org.apache.commons.math.stat.regression.SimpleRegression getRegression(List<ScoredEntity<T>> scoredDocs)
Creates and returns a SimpleRegression for a given list of scored documents scoredDocs. This regression maps unnormalized scores in scoredDocs to normalized/centralized scores in centrScores. Documents that appear both in scoredDocs and centrScores are used as a training for the regression. According to the original paper, only first 10 documents are considered for training.

Parameters:
scoredDocs - The list of scored documents.
Returns:
The SimpleRegression with filled-in training data.
